featured.text: No doubt his ability to listen contributed (28) his capacity to write.
There is a ________ to one’s capacity; one should not make oneself overtired.
capacity of this elevator is 400 kilograms.

definition.zh_def: 容量；能力；接受或容納的能力
definition.en_def: The maximum amount that something can contain or produce.
definition.example: The stadium has a seating capacity of 50,000 people.
